config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _journalDiskSync configuration option is used in the code to determine whether to enable disk synchronization for the journal. If _transientMode is false, a PersistentJournal is created with the specified _journalDiskSync value.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _journalDiskSync configuration depends on how often the journal is accessed and written to. If the journal is frequently updated, the disk synchronization will be triggered more often.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _journalDiskSync configuration option on the system is related to performance and data integrity. Enabling disk synchronization can ensure that data is safely written to disk, but it may also introduce overhead and potentially impact system performance.
